content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
NOTE: All multiplayer servers for WWE 2K17 will be shutdown as of 05/31/2018. After that time, all game functions requiring online servers will no longer function.

Welcome to Suplex City, courtesy of cover Superstar Brock Lesnar! WWE 2K17 features stunningly realistic graphics, ultra-authentic gameplay, and the largest roster of WWE and NXT Superstars to date. The Digital Deluxe Edition includes the WWE 2K17 Season Pass and the NXT Legacy Pack, with access to even more action featuring additional characters and extra moves!

1 - 6 Players
Network Features
Network 2 - 6 Players
Minimum Save Size 6MB
DUALSHOCK®3
HDTV: 720p

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.

© 2005-2016 Take-Two Interactive Software, Inc. and its subsidiaries. 2K, the 2K logo, and Take-Two Interactive Software are all trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Take-Two Interactive Software, Inc. Developed by YUKE’S Co., Ltd. YUKE’S Co., Ltd. and its logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of YUKE’S Co., Ltd.
